message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
I understand your concern, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $130.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make a slightly more aggressive counteroffer. I can offer the product to you for $125.
